title: FoundryPulse
subtitle: Real-time manufacturing performance monitoring
description: A comprehensive modern manufacturing operations platform built with Next.js and TypeScript for real-time production monitoring

content.overview: FoundryPulse is a comprehensive manufacturing monitoring platform that helps manufacturers optimize their processes and increase efficiency.
content.challenge: Manufacturers often struggle with real-time tracking and analysis of production data.
content.solution: We created an intuitive dashboard that displays key performance indicators in real-time.
